item.title: EU trade chief to meet US counterpart in Paris amid increased tariff tensions
item.description: Despite rising tensions, the Commission still hopes to restart negotiations with the US over customs duties.

item.title: Watch: The radio-controlled vehicle enthusiasts flying high in Qatar
item.description: The Qatar RC Sports Centre was opened by Sheikh Mohammed bin Fahd Abdullah Al Thani in 2015.
